laboratory_examinations.findings: Demonstrated a slow and irregular rhythm of background and epileptic discharges.
Revealed that the T2 signal of the bilateral posterior horn of the lateral ventricle was slightly extended.
Two novel variants, c.544_545del and c.230-3C>G, in TPP1 were found.
Confirmed the variants found in WES; c.544_545del variant was inherited from the father, and c.230-3C>G variant was inherited from the mother.
Showed that the length of the PCR product was shortened in the MT construct. Sequencing confirmed the absence of the sequence of exon 4 of 151 nt in length in the MT construct.
